name: Cold Beetroot Soup
description: Beetroot soup with a vegan kefir.

name: Beetroot Soup
description: Beetroot soup with a vegan sausage.

name: Rasols
description: Salad with boiled potatoes, vegan sausage, green peas, carrots and vegan mayonnaise. Spices: salt, pepper, mustard powder.

name: Mock Bacon Pies
description: Small pies with backed chickpeas or mushrooms and fried onions. Spices: soy sauce, cumin.

name: Garlic Toast
description: Fried toast covered in garlic.

name: Sklandrausis
description: Pie with potato and carrot filling. Topped with a layer of vegan cream, cinnamon, or caraway seeds.

name: Grey Peas with Smekis
description: Boiled grey peas with smekis - coconut milk with baked tofu, roasted sunflower seeds and fried onions. Spices: soy sauce, smoked paprika.

name: Sauerkraut
description: Sauerkraut with Beyond meat sausage, boiled potatoes and green peas.

name: Bukstinu Porridge
description: Made from barley groats, oat milk, and potatoes. Served with roast tofu, onions and lingonberry sauce.

name: Herring under a Fur Coat
description: Mock  pickled herring salad with tofu, beets, carrots, nori sheets, vegan mayonnaise etc.

name: Potato pancakes
description: Grated potatoes fried with mock egg and spices.

name: Potatoes with Chanterelle Sauce
description: Boiled potatoes with chanterelle sauce from oat cream.

name: Debesmanna
description: Made from whipped sugar and fruit or berry pulp. Manna mousse is includes whipped cream.

name: Rye Bread Layer
description: Traditional Latvian dessert made from rye breadcrumbs, blackcurrant jam and whipped cream. Topped with grated dark chocolate.

name: The Ant hill
description: Dessert made from cookies, vegan condensed milk, margarine, hazel nuts and poppy seeds.

name: The Sweet Potato
description: Chocolatey mini cake made with cocoa, margarine, nuts and fancy flour.

name: Kombucha
description: Fermented tea with lemon-ginger, jasmine and other flavours.

name: Kvass
description: Fermented, cereal-based, low-alcoholic or non-alcoholic drink with malt.

name: Birch juice
description: Juice extracted from the birch tree.

name: Still water lemonade
description: Still water with lemon.

name: Sparkling water
description: Sparkling water.
